caption: THE BEST!!!🙌🏿🙌🏿😜
Great food, great service! Highly recommend, I will be coming back.

Last week was the first time in this fine restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last. We enjoyed the evening very much with the good service, with the superb  cuisine and wine and with the modest pay. We will definitely visit there in a short time.
Cute little pizzeria you will never know by walking by., Beer , pizza and of course diet Coke ,what more can you ask for. Oh yeah and the pizza was good too!
They raised the prices during the pandemic just not fair at all
The food is consistently well prepared and delicious, staff members hands over great customer service. I love the cleanliness and atmosphere. Will come visit again.
This spot is great! Good rates, considerable dishes and the employees are constantly welcoming.

The pizza crust is exceptional; light & crispy. Ingredients are very flavourful. All their dishes are great. The taste stays in your memory so you want to return. We travel a short distance from the South Bronx to Manhattan on the 6 train to the stop at 116th Street & walk one block. It is a very convenient location.  In addition the owners are very nice and they make you feel at home. Great place!  Afterwards you can shop at Dimitri's Garden Center a few steps away.
I come here with my kids and husband and we absolutely love this family owned TRUE Italian spot! The food and pizza is so scrumptiously good and the customer service is superb!
This place is so great, the food is fresh and the people who work there is amazing. This is my favorite  authentic pizza spot 💖💖
By far the best restaurant I've been to in NYC. Great service, Great food, great people
Great pizza Taste delicious, had to wait about 20 minutes but he was worth it. highly recommend
Order the vegetable Stromboli and the zucchini Fries... great value and your taste buds will thank you!
Fantastic Italian food! Love it!
very reasonable but good pizza with lovely staffs:)

LOVE, LOVE THIS PLACE.  SUCH SWEET, COURTEOUS AND WELCOMING PEOPLE....EVEN THE OWNERS SERVE YOUR FOOD.  IT'S A FAMILY BUSINESS AND THEY MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE YOU ARE PART OF THEIR FAMILY.   AHHH,  THE FOOD IS OUT OF THIS WORLD!!!!......I GO THERE OFTEN (OVER TEN YEARS) and I HAVE NEVER, EVER HAD A  BAD DISH OR EXPERIENCE.  MAY THEY BE THERE FOR A LONG, LONG TIME!!!!!!

I've eaten in a lot of restaurants. Armonie Bistro overpriced small portions not such a friendly environment. I felt like I was being rushed out of the restaurant. I would imagine. It was the oldest outside smoking cigarettes. When entering the restaurant the lady took my order. Never cleans her hands The pizza man never cleaned his hands. When I put it to their attention and they got upset. The worst experience I've ever experienced with me and my family If I could get this a 0 star rating I would
Excellent service, good portions of food, lasagna was magnificent. Will definitely return.

This place is the best  UPDATE: I eat here at least two days a week since 10 months ago of my original review and I can honestly say I have not been disappointed once. The food is amazing from the apps to the entrees. Everything is absolutely 100% each time. This is the best mom and pop shop I have ever been to and I will continue to come here always.
Great!! Place! Great food!!
Armonie Bistro was pretty amazing the food was great and the service was just as great. They really know how to treat customers well I will definitely be coming back and bringing a few friends.

Family restaurant. Best pizza in Harlem that's for sure. The crust is really delicious. Plus the owners are super nice. Very outgoing and friendly. I can bring my kids without a worry. The pastas and stuff are super delicious as well. No complaints.
Fantastic local italian with great pizza and attentive owners who provide excellent service.
Pizza was good
Great food
The best pizza and beer in the local neighborhood

I love Armonie, it's like family when you walk in. Lonnie and Gus are the owners and are beautiful people. And ohhhh wait the food is soooooooo delicious.  I recommend you eat at Armonies, you won't be disappointed.  The price is right.
Best Pizza place Ever
The pizza is old world taste, with quality ingredients, and maybe some crack sprinkled in, because you WILL want more!!
(Translated by Google) Excellent  (Original) Excelente
Great food, great service! Very family friendly 😊
Delicious food,  great customer service and family friendly place to eat.
I have never been here
That pizza was phenomenal and the service is the friendliest you can find. Nothing else needed to say.
Staff is friendly and efficient. We have been there several times, food is good and  priced appropriately. Definitely worth going to.  Never too busy nor any wait.
Best subs!
Armonie Bistro was pretty amazing the food was great and the service was just as great. They really know how to treat customers well I will definitely be coming back and bringing a few friends.

My wife and I love this place! It reminds us of the food from our childhood. They treat us like we are home and not as customers. If you're looking for great food and a neighborhood feel Armonie is the place.
Love the food and place
Armonie is the best Italian in harlem.
I live around the corner the food is consistently good & their customer service is amazing need more ppl like them in the neighborhood.
The penne vodka...whew...delicious. Friendly and hospitable staff. An overall great time!
One of the best pizzas in East Harlem, the sauce is delicious, the cheese is delicious, you can tell they use high quality ingredients.
Great east Harlem pizza spot! Warm, casual atmosphere. The spinach and artichoke slice was deliscious!  There are great pastas and calzones on the menu, too. Great service and friendly staff.
First time... quaint and sweet place to eat... had a delicious minestrone soup with baby spinach salad! I would definitely go again

Awesome place to eat. I felt like I was home and Auntie was cooking. Food is delicious, the service was extraordinary. Portions are huge. My new favorite restaurant. Thank you, I will definitely come again. 😃
Wonderful owners, atmosphere is great and the food is delicious!

Armonise bistro is not your average pizza place. It has a nice quiet atmosphere. The owners are wonderful people friendly and appreciative of your business. The food is delicious especially there meals and the owners will try to satisfy your wishes. The food is moderately priced and they do deliver. However if you call ahead and choose to come pick your order up yourself they will give you a slight discount on your order. They also sell beer or wine to go with your meal. I recommend Armonie Bistro because I've never had a bad experience at this place.
Great!
The food is AAAAMAZING
Quiet, pizza is good.
Great place family owned.
Original Italian cuisine
Incredibly rude over the phone. Website says they take cards. Place an order over $70 and then they say they don’t take card numbers over the phone and she hangs up. Terrible customer service.
Great food
Good pizza at a reasonable price
Great food and service
Best pizza ever
It's always a pleasure going here!
Excellent menu which includes gluten free meals. Prices lower than expected. Cozy & clean.
Pizza is slightly better than Exellence.  Taste so Good.... Pizza has  to be Top 5 well taste pizza in New York........
There service is very welcoming
Delicious pizza - best gluten free crust in the city- made by the sweetest husband and wife team! Discounts for cash payment and for pick up.
Great food and an even greater staff!
Had a good Cheese Calzone for a reasonable price. Cozy atmosphere and good people. I may come back here to relax every now and then.
Always delightful and the family are amazing. The food is really good!
Excellent service, excellent atmosphere, and excellent food! You need to try their signature beer Armonie Amber. You will LOVE it!

Clean. Family business. Attended by the owners. So you expect the best on service. Tasty pizza; fresh mozzarella and classic cheese my favorites. Charming atmosphere. Happy hour! With really good deals. Great for family or friends. Not a crazy place.
Great pizza and beer
Pizza is delicious. Go in a have a nice glass of wine. Great atmosphere
Awesome pizza, great beer and a very groovy vibe.
Excellent
Great food, owners treat everyone like family!

A mom & pop kind of place which I like. The pizza is pretty good, buffalo wings, mozzarella sticks etc... A full length bar makes for a nice place to get a drink, sit and have something to eat or just grab takeout. Oh and they deliver. Just if it's crowded you can wait a while because there's only one waitress.
great experience food was great service excellent. Will go back again and again. a must go place.
Good times had by all. Great pizza!
A great family restaurant. Very friendly atmosphere. Me and my fiancés favorite place
Perfect locally run pizza eatery, great service and food
I loved the garlic knots!
Very nice people, good serve, clean place, I had the garlic knots they were pretty good didn't taste the garlic tho I also  had the Hawaiian pizza it was small but tasted great
Wonderful family restaurant. Amazing pizza. Good prices.
regular NY pizza
Love this place. Close to my neighborhood and great service. Truly a wonderful spot!
Great food, incredibly pleasant staff, reasonably priced, all around awesome neighborhood restaurant.
I ordered my food the girls that answered the phone  said 30-45 minutes. It came an hour and 45 minutes later. Never again.
Very Satisfied, and great comfortable atmosphere ...
Consistently good pizza and standard sides.  We're regulars (for delivery) and planning to stop by the restaurant soon.  Highly recommended.
Great service, food and people
